role.argrole: thing which causes arg0 to be happy

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 喜))) (DEC 的)))) (VP (VC 是) (IP-PRD (NP-SBJ (NN 外贸) (NN 总额)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 仍)) (VP (VV 保持) (AS 着) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (VA 强劲))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 增长) (NN 势头))))) (PU ，) (CC 并) (VP (QP-ADV (ADVP (AD 连续)) (QP (OD 第三) (CLP (M 年)))) (VP (VV 实现) (NP-OBJ (NN 顺差))))))))
